narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 6-year-old female was last seen at Newport News at 2025-11-05T18:26:08.471539+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to return home.
behavioral_patterns: walked through mall corridor into adjacent store

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 4 hours of disappearance, movement cues left on foot toward nearby woods suggest travel northbound along US-58. A white 2016 Jeep Grand Cherokee was observed departing near Newport News, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 15 hours later, a store_employee reported someone matching the description (6-year-old female, wearing white hoodie, black joggers, Spider-Man flip-flops) near Frederick.

provenance._fulltext: A 6-year-old female was last seen at Newport News at 2025-11-05T18:26:08.471539+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to return home. Within 4 hours of disappearance, movement cues left on foot toward nearby woods suggest travel northbound along US-58. A white 2016 Jeep Grand Cherokee was observed departing near Newport News, Virginia. Around 15 hours later, a store_employee reported someone matching the description (6-year-old female, wearing white hoodie, black joggers, Spider-Man flip-flops) near Frederick.
